New Records: Virat Kohli scored his 48th ODI ton and his first in a successful World Cup runchase
Key Match Events: Virat Kohli hit the last ball of the match for six to reach a hundred and win the match
Shreyas Iyer holes out to cow corner for 19
Gill charged Miraz and dragged the ball over midwicket and towards the boundary, but Mahmudullah took a fine catch
Shreyas Iyer edges the last delivery past Mushfiqur through the vacant slip cordon for four
Pre-Game Insights: Bangladesh win the toss and bat
Post-Match Reflections: Virat Kohli said he wanted to make a big contribution and finish the game off this time round
Rohit Sharma said their fielding has been superb and continued that today
Najmul Hossain Shanto said India played better cricket today and they didn't finish well enough with the bat

Bangladesh meet South Africa in a must-win game in Mumbai on Tuesday
Others: Virat Kohli doesn't struggle with finishlineitis
India's requirement is into double figures: 96 from 150 balls
